content: --उदय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} very prosperous or lucky, very glorious or splendid, of great prosperity. (--यः {1} ({%a%}) great elevation or rise, greatness, prosperity; <ls>R. 8. 16.</ls> ({%b%}) great fortune or good luck. ({%e%}) greatness, pre-eminence. {2} final beatitude. {3} a lord, master. {4} <ab>N.</ab> of the district called Kānyakubja or Kanouja; see App. III. {5} <ab>N.</ab> of the capital of Kanouja. {6} sour milk mixed with honey.

महोदय (also called कान्यकुब्ज or गाधिनगर) is the same as the modern Kānyakubja or Kanoja, on the Ganges. In the seventh century it was the most celebrated place in India. Cf. <ls>B. R. 10. 88-89</ls>.
